articles.title: Cancer mortality rates continue to decline amid 'major progress' in lung cancer early detection and treatment - CNN
articles.description: Cancer mortality rates have been dropping for nearly two decades, aided by "major progress" in the early detection and treatment options for lung cancer, according to the American Cancer Society's annual report on cancer statistics, published Wednesday.
